column4: okay i need help setting up an SSH server on Ubuntu Server Feisty running KDE
now what? i installed the package
just connect to the server using your local login and port 22
i am making an SSH server not connecting to one. i am turning my comp into a personal proxy
the computer u installed "ssh" on now has a ssh-server.
how do i configure the options????
what do you want to do?
i think you mean that you want to stream the traffic through ssh? :o
u sure u dont have to install anything extra? :o
yeah i read it.. but never heard about ssh being a proxy server before.. cant help u sorry :):)
since i've never even heard of it, i have no idea what setting to change :)
and scguy318 thanx for all the help. i will come back if i cant figure it out
